### Change v1.5.4 21-JuI-2009
    - Add the possibility to define sevrals qualified namespaces and one unqualified namespace

### Change v1.5.3 20-JuI-2009
    - Add the possibility to define multiple namespaces for exist storage in order to handle records that contain multiple namespace markup (lom and lomfr for example)

### Change v1.5.2 09-JuI-2009
    - fix bug when request a ListIdentifiers verb with a lom OAI encapsulation configuration

### Change v1.5.1 11-Jun-2009
    - fix bug when multiple ressources have the same identifier inside the database to pass OAI validation checks

### Change v1.5 10-Dec-2008
    - Work on the exist part of ZOpenArchives
        - Exist OAI repository: Set definition based on xquery
                                Handle nearly all the OAI spec and can be added to the openarchives registered data providers
        - Exist OAI aggregator: redraw some interface
        - Exist OAI harvester:  redraw some interface
                                add the choice of the exist collection
                                add simple exist collection controls
                                add a repository set view in the update interface


### Change v1.4.1 29-Juil-2008
    - fix some bugs: encoding harvesting problems, issue in exist serveur info conf edition, ...
    - add a filter to transform dc aggragated ressources to lom for storage uniformisation

### Change v1.4 14-Feb-2008    - New zCatalog harvester object for eXist storage type    --> Enable to simply harvest a zCatalog inside an Exist Open Archive Aggregator

### Change v1.3.5 07-Mar-2007
    - fix datestamp repository malformed format - Thx to V. Bonamy, Univ. Rennes 1 - France

### Change v1.3.4 26-Feb-2007
    - Add support of OAI sets in harversters - Thx to S. Pilloz, ENS Lyon - France

### Change v1.3.3 23-Nov-2006
    - fix initial value for deleteRecord var to 'persistent' in pyOAIMH/OAIRepository.py

### Change 1-Mar-2006
    - Add administrator email repository configuration

### Change v1.3.2 27-Feb-2006
    - Automatic CDM namespace added in existRepository and existAggregator objects


### Change v1.3.1 20-Feb-2006
    - add CDM namespace definition in zOAIExistNamespace
    - fix bug in exist identifier ressources handler to get the eXist doc id if no identifier could be found


### Change v1.3 17-Feb-2006
    - add eXsit DB repository features include
      + eXist OAIRepository
      + eXist OAIAggregator


### Change v1.2 12-Oct-2004
    - use BTreeFolder2 in place of BTreeFolder

### Change v1.1 12-Oct-2004
    - Add plone compatibilty (now we can add a Zope OAI Server in a plone site and Add a ZCatalog Harvester on portal_catalog)
    - Add default oai_dc namespace in OAI Aggregator Namespaces folder


## 1.0 Initial release
